# https://www.robotstxt.org/robotstxt.html

# Allow Google to crawl everything including investor search
User-agent: Googlebot
Allow: /

# Block other bots from investor data to prevent scraping
User-agent: *
Allow: /
Allow: /projects
Allow: /projects/
Allow: /investors
Disallow: /search-investors
Disallow: /api/

# Sitemap (auto-generated by Next.js at /sitemap.xml)
Sitemap: https://monkeysraiser.com/sitemap.xml
